Project Summary
===============

Goal Achieved
-------------

1. Admin can create a user who can handle content CRUD.

2. On user create a welcome mail send to user.

3. Admin can create a Classes-Course-Subject-Chapter-Topic-Module.

    3.1. Create a permission objects for all of them via pre_save.

    3.2. API call still in TODO list

4. Admin can assign/delete a permission to a user.
